content: *a light baby blanket crocheted in row of simple shells lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 20117 skill level easy level 2 babysoft® article #920 4 balls print crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge each pattern repeat = 1 75 inches 4 5 cm work in pattern until piece measures 42 inches from beginning crochet border to finish *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
